exceptions.exn: Wrong bullet -: Current bullet - is not finished.
The LHS of plus_INR (INR (_ + _)) does not match any subterm of the goal

original: intros n. induction n. - simpl. reflexivity. - simpl. rewrite IHn. rewrite plus_INR. rewrite S_INR. rewrite <- Rmult_plus_distr_r. replace (INR n + 1) with (INR (S n)) by apply S_INR. rewrite Rmult_assoc. rewrite Rmult_comm. rewrite <- Rmult_plus_distr_r.
